summary: Frontend testing of 4 new CA feature modules (Tally Entry, TDS Filing, Financial Statements, GSTN Settings) completed successfully. All pages load correctly, form interactions work, mode switching functions, and sidebar navigation is properly configured.
critical_code_review_comments: All 4 new pages have proper data-testid attributes for key elements
Forms include proper validation and error handling
Mode switching (Manual/AI) works correctly on all dual-mode pages
context_for_next_testing_agent: New CA feature modules (Tally Entry, TDS Filing, Financial Statements, GSTN Settings) are fully functional. AI extraction endpoints are MOCKED for demo purposes.

tests_performed: Page loads with Manual Entry mode by default
Voucher form with Date, Type, Party, Debit/Credit accounts, Amount, Narration fields
Add Voucher functionality works - voucher appears in table
Success message 'Voucher added successfully' displays
Mode switching to AI OCR Mode works
AI mode shows 'Upload Bank Statement' section
Voucher table shows Date, V.No, Type, Party, Dr/Cr, Amount, Status, Actions columns
Total/Pending/Verified stats update correctly
Page loads with 4-step workflow (Setup -> Entries -> Review -> Export)
Step 1: Form type selection (24Q, 26Q, 27Q, 27EQ) works
Step 1: Quarter selection (Q1-Q4) works
Step 1: TAN, Deductor Name, Deductor PAN fields work
Step 2: TDS Section dropdown with all sections (194A, 194C, 194J, etc.)
Step 2: Auto-calculation of TDS (100000 x 10% = 10000) works correctly
Step 2: Add TDS Entry creates entry in table
Entry table shows Deductee, PAN, Section, Date, Payment, TDS, Status, Actions
Summary row shows Total Entries, Total Payment, Total TDS
Mode switching (Manual/AI) works
Page loads with 4-step workflow (Trial Balance -> Classification -> Generate -> Export)
Company Details section (Company Name, Financial Year, Period End Date)
Manual Entry form with Account Name, Account Group dropdown, Debit/Credit fields
Account Group dropdown has proper options (Fixed Assets, Current Assets, Equity, Income, Expenses)
Add Entry creates entry in Trial Balance table
Balance indicator shows Dr/Cr totals and 'Balanced' status
Mode switching to Upload mode shows file upload section
Trial Balance table with Account Name, Group, Debit, Credit, Actions
Page loads with purple gradient header
GSP Provider dropdown with options (ClearTax, Tally, Zoho, etc.)
Environment dropdown (Sandbox/Production)
API Key field with show/hide toggle
API Secret field with show/hide toggle
GSP Username and Password fields
GSTIN to Link field
Filing Preferences section with OTP preference (SMS/Email)
DSC toggle and Auto-fetch GSTR-2B toggle
Save Configuration - WORKS! Shows success message
Test Connection button present
How to Get GSTN API Credentials guide
Tally Entry nav link (data-testid='nav-tally-entry') navigates to /tally-entry
TDS Filing nav link (data-testid='nav-tds-filing') navigates to /tds-filing
Financial Statements nav link (data-testid='nav-financial-statements') navigates to /financial-statements
GSTN Settings nav link (data-testid='nav-gstn-settings') navigates to /settings/gstn
All nav links have correct styling and icons

mocked_apis_note: AI extraction endpoints (/api/tally/extract-statement, /api/tds/extract-data, /api/financial/extract-trial-balance) use MOCKED data for demo purposes as mentioned in review request. The frontend falls back to demo data when API fails.
